snippet.title: Draw Saber 🤺⚔🤺 Gameplay Android, iOS - Draw Swords & Fights
snippet.description:
Draw Saber - Gameplay Walkthrough (Android & iOS) 

Subscribe to the channel:
https://www.youtube.com/c/HyperDailyGames 

Draw Saber - KAYAC Inc

Download the game: 
 (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=en&id=com.kayac.drawSaber
 (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/US/app/id1614576854?l=en

------------------------------------------------------ 
Game Description: 
Draw the trajectory of the sword! Beat! Survive!
------------------------------------------------------ 

Welcome to Hyper Daily - An Android and iOS Gaming Channel. Here you will find the latest and best android and iOS games. 

We'll give you an overview of levels gameplay of each game here so sit back and enjoy! Gameplay videos are uploaded everyday as we play all levels and analyze games on daily basis. 

Games that are in early stages (also known as soft launches) are also posted here along with other games. So if you're looking for games ideas or trying to understand the hottest trends in the hyper casual market, you've come to the right place. 

Sit back and enjoy!! 

#drawsaber #androidgame #sword #swordfighting #newgame #iosgame #gameplay #mobilegame
